ForearmsCBWristCurl.name: Cable Wrist Curl
ForearmsCBWristCurl.preparation: Sit and grasp cable bar with narrow to shoulder width underhand grip. Rest forearms on thighs with wrists just beyond knees.
ForearmsCBWristCurl.execution: Allow cable bar to roll out of palms down to fingers. Raise cable bar back up by gripping and pointing knuckles up as high as possible. Lower and repeat.

ForearmsCBOneArmWristCurl.name: Cable One Arm Wrist Curl
ForearmsCBOneArmWristCurl.preparation: Sit and grasp cable stirrup. Rest forearm on thigh with palm up and wrist just beyond knees.
ForearmsCBOneArmWristCurl.execution: Allow cable bar to roll out of palms down to fingers. Raise cable bar back up by gripping and pointing knuckles up as high as possible. Lower and repeat.
ForearmsCBOneArmWristCurl.comments: Hand may be placed under wrist (as demonstrated) to offer stability and to maintain horizontal orientation of forearm.

ForearmsCBRollerWristFlexion.name: Cable Roller Wrist Flexion
ForearmsCBRollerWristFlexion.preparation: Stand behind weight plate(s) on floor and grasp wrist roller handle with both hands over hand grip.
ForearmsCBRollerWristFlexion.execution: With left hand gripping handle, relax grip of right hand and slide grip behind handle (by hypexending wrist) and regrip. Relax grip of left hand and flex right wrist. Repeat sequence with opposite hands, alternating back and forth until weight plate has raised up near hands. Lower weight steadily with opposite movement.
ForearmsCBRollerWristFlexion.stabilizers: trapeziusupper, levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, bicepsbrachii, wristextensors, brachialis, trapeziusmiddle, deltoidanterior
